reporter_caption.center: HARRISON v. GREAT LAKES BEVERAGE COMPANY, 120900 (Mich. 2002)

caption.center: GEOFFREY HARRISON, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. GREAT LAKES BEVERAGE COMPANY,
an Assumed Name for The Wolpin Co, and KEN WALTON, Defendants-Appellees.

opinion.opinion_text:
COA: 224626, Wayne CC: 98-833097-NZ
On order of the Court, the motion for reconsideration of this Court's order of August 30, 2002 is considered, and it is DENIED, because it does not appear that the order was entered erroneously.
